field.name: ma_dot
field.check: ma_dot not in (select ma_dot from hrrmdot)

field.name: ma_tt
field.check: ma_tt not in (select ma_tt from hrdmtths)

field.name: ma_vtr
field.check: not exists(select 1 from hrrmdotct b where b.ma_dot = @@table.ma_dot and b.ma_vtr = @@table.ma_vtr)

field.name: ma_bp
field.check: not exists(select 1 from hrrmdotct b where b.ma_dot = @@table.ma_dot and b.ma_vtr = @@table.ma_vtr and b.ma_bp = @@table.ma_bp)

field.name: ma_kenh
field.check: ma_kenh not in (select ma_kenh from hrdmkenhtd)

field.name: ma_nguon
field.check: ma_nguon not in (select ma_nguon from hrdmnguontd)

field.name: cmnd_noi_cap
field.check: cmnd_noi_cap <> '' and cmnd_noi_cap not in (select ma_tinh from hrdmtinh)

field.name: quoc_tich
field.check: quoc_tich <> '' and quoc_tich not in (select ma_qt from dmqt)

field.name: dan_toc
field.check: dan_toc <> '' and dan_toc not in (select ma_dt from hrdmdt)

field.name: ton_giao
field.check: ton_giao <> '' and ton_giao not in (select ma_tg from hrdmtg)

field.name: ma_tthn
field.check: ma_tthn <> '' and ma_tthn not in (select ma_tthn from hrdmtthn)

field.name: ma_nn
field.check: ma_nn <> '' and ma_nn not in (select ma_nn from hrdmnn)

field.name: bang_cap_nn
field.check: bang_cap_nn <> '' and bang_cap_nn not in (select ma_cc from hrdmcc)

text.v: Cập nhật hồ sơ ứng viên

processing.text: declare @message nvarchar(4000), @q nvarchar(4000), @key nvarchar(4000), @irregular nvarchar(4000), @irregularChars varchar(128), @field varchar(32), @wsID varchar(1), @maxID char(13) declare @user int, @admin bit, @language char(1), @sys varchar(32), @count int, @r int, @currentID int select @admin = @@admin, @user = @@userID, @key = '' select @wsID = rtrim(val) from options where rtrim(name) = 'm_ws_id' select @irregularChars = &IrregularValue; select @irregular = case @@language when 'v' then N'Giá trị tại ô %invalidCell có chứa các ký tự: ' + @irregularChars else 'The value of cell %invalidCell contains any of the following characters: ' + @irregularChars end -- Delete if @type = '0' delete @@table from @@table a where exists(select 1 from hrrmhs b where a.ma_hs = b.ma_hs) -- Check if @$mode = 1 begin &IrregularMessage; &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select 'ma_hs', stt, @message from @@table where ma_hs like '%[' + @irregularChars + ']%' &EndErrorCount; end else begin select @field = 'ma_hs', @r = min(stt) from @@table where ma_hs like '%[' + @irregularChars + ']%'&Irregular; end &Checking; &EndErrorMode; -- Key if @@admin = 0 begin if @type = '1' begin if @@sysDatabaseName.dbo.AI_ERP$System$GetAuthorize(@@admin, @@userID, 'hrRMApplicantProfileInput', 'Edit') = 0 select @type = '0' end end -- Gather if @type = '0' delete @@table from @@table a where exists(select 1 from hrrmhs b where a.ma_hs = b.ma_hs) select c.ma_dvcs, a.* into #k from @@table a join hrrmhs b with(nolock) on a.ma_hs = b.ma_hs join hrrmdot c with(nolock) on a.ma_dot = c.ma_dot where (@admin = 1 or exists(select 1 from sysunitrights r where r.user_id = @user and r.ma_dvcs = c.ma_dvcs and r.r_access = 1)) delete a from @@table a where exists(select 1 from #k b where a.ma_hs = b.ma_hs) delete a from @@table a join hrrmdot b with(nolock) on a.ma_dot = b.ma_dot where (@admin <> 1 and not exists(select 1 from sysunitrights r where r.user_id = @user and r.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs and r.r_access = 1)) delete a from #k a where exists(select 1 from hrrmhs b where a.ma_hs = b.ma_hs and b.status = '1') select top 0 ma_dvcs, ma_dot, ma_hs, ho_uv, ten_uv, ngay_sinh, noi_sinh, gioi_tinh, ngay_nop, ma_tt, ma_vtr, ma_bp, muc_luong, ngay_lv_dk, ma_kenh, ma_nguon, nguoi_gt, dia_chi, dien_thoai, email, ghi_chu, cmnd_so, cmnd_ngay_hl, cmnd_noi_cap, cmnd_ngay_hh, quoc_tich, dan_toc, ton_giao, ma_tthn, ngay_kham, chieu_cao, can_nang, mat_phai, mat_trai, nhom_mau, loai_sk, ghi_chu_sk, cap_dt, truong_dt, chuong_trinh_dt, ngay_dt_tu, ngay_dt_den, ngay_cap_cc, diem_dt, xep_loai_dt, ghi_chu_dt, ma_nn, bang_cap_nn, diem_nn, ngay_cap_nn, ghi_chu_nn, cast(0 as int) as stt into #r from hrrmhs insert into #r select b.ma_dvcs, a.ma_dot, a.ma_hs, a.ho_uv, a.ten_uv, a.ngay_sinh, a.noi_sinh, a.gioi_tinh, a.ngay_nop, a.ma_tt, a.ma_vtr, a.ma_bp, a.muc_luong, a.ngay_lv_dk, a.ma_kenh, a.ma_nguon, a.nguoi_gt, a.dia_chi, a.dien_thoai, a.email, a.ghi_chu, a.cmnd_so, a.cmnd_ngay_hl, a.cmnd_noi_cap, a.cmnd_ngay_hh, a.quoc_tich, a.dan_toc, a.ton_giao, a.ma_tthn, a.ngay_kham, a.chieu_cao, a.can_nang, a.mat_phai, a.mat_trai, a.nhom_mau, a.loai_sk, a.ghi_chu_sk, a.cap_dt, a.truong_dt, a.chuong_trinh_dt, a.ngay_dt_tu, a.ngay_dt_den, a.ngay_cap_cc, a.diem_dt, a.xep_loai_dt, a.ghi_chu_dt, a.ma_nn, a.bang_cap_nn, a.diem_nn, a.ngay_cap_nn, a.ghi_chu_nn, a.stt from @@table a join hrrmdot b with(nolock) on a.ma_dot = b.ma_dot order by a.ma_dot, a.ma_hs, a.stt -- Insert select @count = count(*) from #r if @count > 0 begin select @maxID = max(stt_rec) from hrrmhs select @currentID = case when @maxID is null then 1 else cast(substring(@maxID, 2, 9) as int) end &Inserting; end -- Update if @type = '1' &Updating;
